        StackCameraSimulationProvider getStackProvider(int pIndex)
        Returns the stack provider for this sample simulator
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        stack provider

      • connectTo

        void connectTo(MicroscopeInterface<Q> pMicroscope)
        Connects this simulator to all relevant devices of (most logically simulated) microscope, such as stage, laser, detection and illumination arms... Changes in the stage position, laser power, will be reflected by the simulator. IMPORTANT: The 'connection' must of course happen after the microscope devices have been all set up...
        Parameters:
        pMicroscope - microscope
